pullrequest.title: Improve ODE slip parameter behavior with multiple contact points

content.raw:
## behavior before the fix

the boxes move at a different rate than the single spheres, even though they have the same slip parameter

![slip_before.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3227941140-slip_before.gif)

## behavior after the fix

the boxes move at the same rate as the single spheres

![slip_after.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/959316863-slip_after.gif)
content.html:
behavior before the fix

the boxes move at a different rate than the single spheres, even though they have the same slip parameter

behavior after the fix

the boxes move at the same rate as the single spheres
